title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5105.3 - Video lottery gaming key employee and video lottery gaming employee applications and disclosure forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5105.3 - Video lottery gaming key employee and video lottery gaming employee applications and disclosure forms

State Regulations
(a) The
video lottery gaming key employee and video lottery gaming employee
applications, personal history disclosure forms or principal disclosure forms
shall be in a format prescribed by the commission. (b) In addition to any information requested
in the application, each applicant for a video lottery key employee and video
lottery gaming employee license shall provide the commission: (1)
the name, address, occupation and phone
number of each person(s) who can attest to the applicant's character and
reputation; (2)
a signed, dated and
notarized certification of truth; and
(3)
a signed, dated and notarized release
authorization(s) that shall direct all courts, probation departments, selective
service boards, employers, educational institutions, financial and other
institutions and all governmental agencies to release any and all information
pertaining to the applicant as requested by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5105.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
